layman_description: A reliable crossbow that fires bolts with steady damage.
technical_description: Item property defining description key for iron-tiered crossbow with medium-range ballistic projectile mechanics.
player_impact: Appears in your inventory with a weapon description helping you understand its hunting and combat role.

layman_description: An unlocked wall-mounted safe holding loot without any security features.
technical_description: Loot container block with no lock mechanism and open accessibility for immediate item extraction.
player_impact: You can walk up and take items directly from this safe in buildings without needing tools or skills.

layman_description: A collection of high-power ammunition rounds for heavy weapons.
technical_description: Item grouping containing multiple ammunition variants for high-damage firearms and explosives.
player_impact: Shows in crafting recipes and trader catalogs when you have access to powerful ammunition options.

layman_description: An open desk safe with visible contents ready for looting.
technical_description: Desk-mounted loot container with unlocked state and immediate item availability.
player_impact: Found in offices and shops, you can grab the valuable items inside without any unlock challenge.

layman_description: Armor-piercing ammunition designed to penetrate zombie and player defenses.
technical_description: Specialized ammunition group with high armor bypass properties for defeating protected targets.
player_impact: Becomes available as you progress in combat and hunt tougher protected enemies.

layman_description: An accessible gun safe displaying firearms without security barriers.
technical_description: Weapon storage container with unsecured access to firearm loot distribution.
player_impact: Guns and magazines are readily available to take from these safes in military locations.

layman_description: Special arrows that explode on impact for splash damage.
technical_description: Projectile ammunition with explosive property triggering area damage on target hit.
player_impact: When you fire these from bows, you damage a wider area instead of just the target.

layman_description: A white-painted unlocked gun safe with visible firearm storage.
technical_description: Cosmetic variant of weapon container with white material override and standard loot mechanics.
player_impact: Appears in specific buildings with the same loot as other gun safes but in white finish.

layman_description: Packaged ammunition bundles for various firearm types.
technical_description: Ammunition grouping providing batch-level selections for magazine and cartridge distribution.
player_impact: Shows up in loot piles and vendor selections when you need different ammo types.

layman_description: A brown-finished gun safe without locks that shows stored weapons.
technical_description: Weapon container variant with brown material texture and unsecured loot access state.
player_impact: Another visual variant of accessible gun safes, typically found in survival and shelter locations.

layman_description: Collection of firearm attachments and repair components for gun maintenance.
technical_description: Item group containing weapon mods, barrels, stocks, and attachment parts for firearms.
player_impact: You can find these parts in loot and use them to customize guns in your inventory.

layman_description: A wall-mounted safe in open state displaying its contents.
technical_description: Loot container showing opened state with immediate item access capability.
player_impact: You can see items inside from a distance and loot them quickly without interaction time.

layman_description: Components and upgrades for building and maintaining vehicles.
technical_description: Item collection for vehicle assembly, including frames, wheels, engines, and functional parts.
player_impact: Collect these to craft minibikes, motorcycles, and trucks for faster travel.

layman_description: A desk safe in opened state showing valuables inside.
technical_description: Desk container rendering with open animation state and accessible loot drop mechanics.
player_impact: Found in office areas, you can loot these quickly and the contents are clearly visible.

layman_description: Ready-to-use vehicle items that can be placed in the world.
technical_description: Placeable vehicle instances that become interactive entities when deployed in game world.
player_impact: You can place motorcycles and minibikes from your inventory to use for travel.

layman_description: A player-modified desk safe without locks for personal storage.
technical_description: Desk container variant customized by player ownership without access restrictions.
player_impact: You can create secure storage in your base by placing these safes.

layman_description: A deployable bicycle for fast personal transportation.
technical_description: Bicycle item instance with placement and ride mechanics for solo travel.
player_impact: Place a bicycle in your base to quickly travel around the map.

layman_description: A player-owned gun safe without any locks on weapons.
technical_description: Firearm storage container with player ownership and no security lock mechanism.
player_impact: You can set up weapon storage in your base using these safes.

layman_description: Standard shotgun ammunition for close-range zombie elimination.
technical_description: Shotgun projectile type with spread damage pattern and short effective range.
player_impact: Fires multiple pellets at once when you shoot, making it powerful against close enemies.

layman_description: A player-placed wall safe in open state for personal loot storage.
technical_description: Wall-mounted container variant with open state rendering and player ownership.
player_impact: You can mount safes on your walls at home to organize and protect items.
